question: How many days it took India to achieve one crore COVID-19 vaccination mark?
explanation:
India has taken 34 days to achieve 1 crore COVID-19 vaccination mark. India became the second fastest country in the world to achieve 1 crore vaccination. Covid vaccine has been administered first to health care workers and frontline workers.
USA took 31 days and the United Kingdom took 56 days to achieve 1 crore vaccination mark.
